variables.variable:
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat from math import log, pi import vortex_tools as vt import numpy
# background viscosity nu=0.01
# kinetic energy L2 norm
#DNS timep12 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-periodic_12.stat")["ElapsedTime"]["value"] tkep12 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-periodic_12.stat")["fluid"]["TKE"]["l2norm"] dtkep12 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-periodic_12.stat")["fluid"]["TKEDiff"]["l2norm"] timep24 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-periodic_24.stat")["ElapsedTime"]["value"] tkep24 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-periodic_24.stat")["fluid"]["TKE"]["l2norm"] dtkep24 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-periodic_24.stat")["fluid"]["TKEDiff"]["l2norm"] timep48 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-periodic_48.stat")["ElapsedTime"]["value"] tkep48 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-periodic_48.stat")["fluid"]["TKE"]["l2norm"] dtkep48 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-periodic_48.stat")["fluid"]["TKEDiff"]["l2norm"]
#LES timelp12 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-periodic_12.stat")["ElapsedTime"]["value"] tkelp12 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-periodic_12.stat")["fluid"]["TKE"]["l2norm"] dtkelp12 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-periodic_12.stat")["fluid"]["TKEDiff"]["l2norm"] devlp12 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-periodic_12.stat")["fluid"]["EddyViscosityDiff%magnitude"]["l2norm"] timelp24 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-periodic_24.stat")["ElapsedTime"]["value"] tkelp24 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-periodic_24.stat")["fluid"]["TKE"]["l2norm"] dtkelp24 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-periodic_24.stat")["fluid"]["TKEDiff"]["l2norm"] devlp24 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-periodic_24.stat")["fluid"]["EddyViscosityDiff%magnitude"]["l2norm"] timelp48 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-periodic_48.stat")["ElapsedTime"]["value"] tkelp48 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-periodic_48.stat")["fluid"]["TKE"]["l2norm"] dtkelp48 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-periodic_48.stat")["fluid"]["TKEDiff"]["l2norm"] devlp48 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-periodic_48.stat")["fluid"]["EddyViscosityDiff%magnitude"]["l2norm"]
timelap12 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-aniso-periodic_12.stat")["ElapsedTime"]["value"] tkelap12 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-aniso-periodic_12.stat")["fluid"]["TKE"]["l2norm"] dtkelap12 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-aniso-periodic_12.stat")["fluid"]["TKEDiff"]["l2norm"] devlap12 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-aniso-periodic_12.stat")["fluid"]["EddyViscosityDiff%magnitude"]["l2norm"] timelap24 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-aniso-periodic_24.stat")["ElapsedTime"]["value"] tkelap24 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-aniso-periodic_24.stat")["fluid"]["TKE"]["l2norm"] dtkelap24 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-aniso-periodic_24.stat")["fluid"]["TKEDiff"]["l2norm"] devlap24 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-aniso-periodic_24.stat")["fluid"]["EddyViscosityDiff%magnitude"]["l2norm"] timelap48 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-aniso-periodic_48.stat")["ElapsedTime"]["value"] tkelap48 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-aniso-periodic_48.stat")["fluid"]["TKE"]["l2norm"] dtkelap48 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-aniso-periodic_48.stat")["fluid"]["TKEDiff"]["l2norm"] devlap48 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-les-aniso-periodic_48.stat")["fluid"]["EddyViscosityDiff%magnitude"]["l2norm"]
#dynamic LES timedlp12 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-periodic_12.stat")["ElapsedTime"]["value"] tkedlp12 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-periodic_12.stat")["fluid"]["TKE"]["l2norm"] dtkedlp12 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-periodic_12.stat")["fluid"]["TKEDiff"]["l2norm"] devdlp12 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-periodic_12.stat")["fluid"]["EddyViscosityDiff%magnitude"]["l2norm"] timedlp24 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-periodic_24.stat")["ElapsedTime"]["value"] tkedlp24 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-periodic_24.stat")["fluid"]["TKE"]["l2norm"] dtkedlp24 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-periodic_24.stat")["fluid"]["TKEDiff"]["l2norm"] devdlp24 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-periodic_24.stat")["fluid"]["EddyViscosityDiff%magnitude"]["l2norm"] timedlp48 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-periodic_48.stat")["ElapsedTime"]["value"] tkedlp48 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-periodic_48.stat")["fluid"]["TKE"]["l2norm"] dtkedlp48 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-periodic_48.stat")["fluid"]["TKEDiff"]["l2norm"] devdlp48 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-periodic_48.stat")["fluid"]["EddyViscosityDiff%magnitude"]["l2norm"]
timedlap12 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-aniso-periodic_12.stat")["ElapsedTime"]["value"] tkedlap12 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-aniso-periodic_12.stat")["fluid"]["TKE"]["l2norm"] dtkedlap12 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-aniso-periodic_12.stat")["fluid"]["TKEDiff"]["l2norm"]
timedlap24 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-aniso-periodic_24.stat")["ElapsedTime"]["value"] tkedlap24 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-aniso-periodic_24.stat")["fluid"]["TKE"]["l2norm"] dtkedlap24 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-aniso-periodic_24.stat")["fluid"]["TKEDiff"]["l2norm"]
timedlap48 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-aniso-periodic_48.stat")["ElapsedTime"]["value"] tkedlap48 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-aniso-periodic_48.stat")["fluid"]["TKE"]["l2norm"] dtkedlap48 = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-dynles-aniso-periodic_48.stat")["fluid"]["TKEDiff"]["l2norm"]
# Analytical solution exact = stat("taylor-green-vortex-2d-periodic_48.stat")["fluid"]["ExactTKE"]["l2norm"] texact = timep48
times=(timep12,timep24,timep48,timelp12,timelp24,timelp48,timelap12,timelap24,timelap48,timedlp12,timedlp24,timedlp48,timedlap12,timedlap24,timedlap48,texact) tke=(tkep12,tkep24,tkep48,tkelp12,tkelp24,tkelp48,tkelap12,tkelap24,tkelap48,tkedlp12,tkedlp24,tkedlp48,tkedlap12,tkedlap24,tkedlap48,exact) error=(dtkep12,dtkep24,dtkep48,dtkelp12,dtkelp24,dtkelp48,dtkelap12,dtkelap24,dtkelap48,dtkedlp12,dtkedlp24,dtkedlp48,dtkedlap12,dtkedlap24,dtkedlap48) evtimes=(timelp12,timelp24,timelp48,timelap12,timelap24,timelap48,timedlp12,timedlp24,timedlp48) everror=(devlp12,devlp24,devlp48,devlap12,devlap24,devlap48,devdlp12,devdlp24,devdlp48)
# Time derivative of TKE dissiprates = vt.differentiate(times,tke) vt.plot_dissipation(times,dissiprates)
# Error plot vt.plot_tke(times,error)
# Integrals over time integrals = vt.integrate(times,error) print 'integrals ', integrals evintegrals = vt.integrate(evtimes,everror) print 'ev error integrals ', evintegrals
# IS THIS THE CORRECT WAY TO MEASURE CONVERGENCE? conv1224 = abs(integrals[0]/integrals[1]) conv2448 = abs(integrals[1]/integrals[2])
convlp1224 = abs(integrals[3]/integrals[4]) convlp2448 = abs(integrals[4]/integrals[5])
convlap1224 = abs(integrals[6]/integrals[7]) convlap2448 = abs(integrals[7]/integrals[8])
convdlp1224 = abs(integrals[9]/integrals[10]) convdlp2448 = abs(integrals[10]/integrals[11])
convdlap1224 = abs(integrals[12]/integrals[13]) convdlap2448 = abs(integrals[13]/integrals[14])
convlpev1224 = abs(evintegrals[0]/evintegrals[1]) convlpev2448 = abs(evintegrals[1]/evintegrals[2]) convlapev1224 = abs(evintegrals[3]/evintegrals[4]) convlapev2448 = abs(evintegrals[4]/evintegrals[5]) convdlpev1224 = abs(evintegrals[6]/evintegrals[7]) convdlpev2448 = abs(evintegrals[7]/evintegrals[8])
# Write convergence stats to file output=open('output.log','w') output.write('convergence_periodic_12_24 '+str(log(conv1224,2))+'\n') output.write('convergence_periodic_24_48 '+str(log(conv2448,2))+'\n') output.write('convergence_les_periodic_12_24 '+str(log(convlp1224,2))+'\n') output.write('convergence_les_periodic_24_48 '+str(log(convlp2448,2))+'\n') output.write('convergence_les_aniso_periodic_12_24 '+str(log(convlap1224,2))+'\n') output.write('convergence_les_aniso_periodic_24_48 '+str(log(convlap2448,2))+'\n') output.write('convergence_dynles_periodic_12_24 '+str(log(convdlp1224,2))+'\n') output.write('convergence_dynles_periodic_24_48 '+str(log(convdlp2448,2))+'\n') output.write('convergence_dynles_aniso_periodic_12_24 '+str(log(convdlap1224,2))+'\n') output.write('convergence_dynles_aniso_periodic_24_48 '+str(log(convdlap2448,2))+'\n') output.write('convergence_ev_les_periodic_12_24 '+str(log(convlpev1224,2))+'\n') output.write('convergence_ev_les_periodic_24_48 '+str(log(convlpev2448,2))+'\n') output.write('convergence_ev_les_aniso_periodic_12_24 '+str(log(convlapev1224,2))+'\n') output.write('convergence_ev_les_aniso_periodic_24_48 '+str(log(convlapev2448,2))+'\n') output.write('convergence_ev_dynles_periodic_12_24 '+str(log(convdlpev1224,2))+'\n') output.write('convergence_ev_dynles_periodic_24_48 '+str(log(convdlpev2448,2))+'\n') output.close()
dissipation_error = [log(conv1224,2),log(conv2448,2),log(convlp1224,2),log(convlp2448,2),log(convlap1224,2),log(convlap2448,2),log(convdlp1224,2),log(convdlp2448,2),log(convdlap1224,2),log(convdlap2448,2)]
